```{r}
library(reshape2)
library(ggplot2)

cat("\014")  

genseq <- function(by=.1, r=1) {
    seq(-r, r, by=by)
}

f <- function(x, r=1) {
    sqrt((r-x)*(r+x))
}

area <- function(x, r=1) {
    f(x) * r
}

circleMatrix <- function(n, r=1) {
    x <- genseq(n, r)
    y <- f(x)
    
    matrix(c(x, y), 2)
}

### Data
```
